chapters.title: Chapter 27: A Plain Wooden Box
chapters.info: Welyn Kajima, p. 583—Dedicated in his middle years. Toveine thinks he smiles too much. He is the “husband” of Jenare. Before coming to the Black Tower, he was a clerk in Arafel—he looks like a clerk. He wears his hair in braids and bells just like Jahar Narishma.
